title: Start
body:
<<faceRight Haia>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
Haia: That's all for today.
<<moveLeft Haia 160 80>>
<<hide Haia>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
[[getinplace]]

title: getinplace
body:
Renata-renatasmilingface: Wanna practice that move?
Mia-miasmileface: I think I've got it down now.
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToY Renata Target -15 40>>
<<moveToX Renata Target 30 40>>
<<moveToX Mia Target 30 40>>
<<moveToY Mia Target -30 40>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 20>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
[[miasjump]]

title: miasjump
body:
Mia-miafiercefight: Let's go!
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveLeft Renata 10 60>>
<<moveToX Mia Renata 10 80>>
<<moveToY Mia Renata 0 80>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.5>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<moveUp Mia 15 100>>
<<moveToX Mia Renata 0 100>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveDown Mia 2 80>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.1>>
<<moveUp Mia 4 80>>
<<moveLeft Mia 20 80>>
<<faceRight Mia>>
<<moveLeft Mia 30 100>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 80>>
[[miahits]]

title: miahits
body:
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<moveRight Mia 8 60>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 17>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<moveLeft Mia 8 60>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 14>>
[[renatahitsnow]]

title: renatahitsnow
body:
<<moveToX Renata Target 5 80>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<moveLeft Renata 3 60>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 17>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<moveRight Renata 3 60>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>

[[goback]]

title: goback
body:
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<moveToY Mia Target -30 140>>
<<moveToX Mia Target 28 140>>
<<moveToX Renata Target 30 80>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 20>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.5>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
[[celebration]]

title: celebration
body:
Renata-renatahappyface: Yes!!!
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveUp Renata 10 80>>
<<moveDown Renata 10 80>>
<<moveUp Mia 10 80>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 80>>
Mia-mialaughingface: Haha!
<<toMap endCredits 1>>
